instructions: ["Put peppers, onion and garlic in blender with juice from tomatoes.", "Blend a few seconds to chop; add remaining ingredients. Blend a second or two to chop up tomatoes; stir.", "Serve with tortilla chips."]

title: Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 medium onion", "1 garlic clove", "1 (16 oz.) can chile beans", "1 tsp. oregano", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "2 Tbsp. green chiles", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1/2 c. water", "4 (6-inch) corn tortillas", "1/2 c. shredded skim milk Mozzarella cheese"]
instructions: ["Saute beef, onion and garlic until brown and tender.", "Combine beans, oregano, chili powder, chiles, tomato sauce and water in separate saucepan.", "Bring to a boil and simmer 5 minutes."]

title: Mexican Lasagna
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 tsp. red pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. black pepper", "1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped", "10 to 12 corn tortillas", "2 c. small curd cottage cheese, drained", "1 c. grated Monterey cheese with peppers", "1 egg", "1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese", "2 c. shredded lettuce", "1/2 c. chopped tomatoes", "3 green onions, chopped", "1/4 c. sliced black olives"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef; drain thoroughly.", "Add cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, red pepper, salt, pepper and tomatoes; heat through. Cover bottom and sides of 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish with tortillas.", "Pour beef mixture over tortillas.", "Place a layer of tortillas over meat mixture and set aside."]

title: Jackie'S Gorditas(Jackie Clotfelter)
ingredients: ["1 c. masa", "1 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 1/3 c. warm water", "taco fixings", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "vegetable oil for frying"]
instructions: ["Combine masa, flour, baking powder and salt.", "Add water slowly and knead to a stiff dough.", "Cover dough and let sit for 15 minutes.", "Divide dough into 6 portions and roll into balls.", "Roll balls out to 1/4-inch thick.", "Deep fry until puffed and browned. (They will be hollow.)", "Cut off the end and stuff as you would a taco."]

title: Tangy Salsa Shrimp And Rice
ingredients: ["1 lb. shelled deveined shrimp", "1 c. salsa", "1 c. rice, cooked", "1 jar (4 oz.) chopped green chilies, drained", "1/3 c. chopped scallions", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["In bowl, mix shrimp and salsa.", "Cover and chill 1 hour.", "Cook rice and add chilies, scallions, salt and pepper. Mix well. Skewer salsa-coated shrimp; broil or grill.", "Place on rice.", "Serves 4."]

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger, cooked and drained", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 c. raw rice, cooked", "1 c. tomato sauce", "1/2 pkg. chili seasoning"]
instructions: ["In large shallow baking pan, put 1 layer corn chips (not too thick, as it dries out), 1 layer rice and 1 layer hamburger mixture (hamburger, onion, tomato sauce and chili seasoning).", "Sprinkle with grated cheese (Cheddar).", "Put in oven to melt cheese.", "On top, put 1 layer shredded lettuce and 1 layer cherry tomatoes (or cut up whole tomatoes)."]

title: Chicken Casserole (Mexican Style)
ingredients: ["1 chopped onion", "1 can mushroom soup", "3/4 lb. chicken, cooked and deboned", "1 can chicken soup", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes", "1 medium pkg. Doritos", "1/2 lb. grated Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Heat onion, soups and Ro-Tel in saucepan, then in casserole dish, put layer of chicken, layer of soup mixture, layer of Doritos and top with cheese.", "Bake in slow oven until mixture bubbles."]

title: Sour Cream Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 can chopped green chili (optional)", "1 carton sour cream", "1 carton cottage cheese", "1 lb. sharp cheddar cheese", "2 dozen. corn tortillas", "2 Tbsp. cooking oil", "2 c. enchilada sauce"]
instructions: ["Soften tortillas by dipping in hot oil for 2-3 seconds, drain on paper towels and set aside.", "In medium size bowl mix sour cream, cottage cheese and green chili; set aside.", "Grate 1 cup cheese; set aside.", "Cut remaining cheese into 24 slender sticks (about 1/2 x 2", "inches).", "Taking one tortilla shell at a time, place a stick of cheese and a heaping tablespoon of sour cream mixture on it and roll.", "Place the rolled tortillas in a 9 x 13 inch casserole dish.", "Cover tortillas with enchiladas sauce.", "Top with grated cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly."]

title: Mexican Corn Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. self-rising corn meal", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1 hot pepper", "1 sweet pepper", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cream-style corn", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 c. grated cheese", "1 c. milk", "1/2 c. cooking oil", "1 egg"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients. Bake in an iron skillet at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes or until brown."]

title: Mexican Hominy
ingredients: ["2 cans yellow hominy", "1 medium bell pepper, chopped", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 stick oleo", "1 (8 oz.) jar jalapeno Cheez Whiz", "1/2 small jar pimento"]
instructions: ["Melt oleo.", "Saute onion and bell pepper in oleo until tender. Empty the 2 cans of hominy, draining one and draining 1/2 of the other can.", "Mix in with the onion and bell pepper mixture.", "Stir in Cheez Whiz and pimento until melted and mixed well.", "Pour into casserole dish.", "Bake until bubbly."]

title: Guacamole
ingredients: ["3 avocados", "2 tsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. onion, grated", "1 tomato, chopped", "1 hot pepper, mashed"]
instructions: ["Peel and mash ripe avocado pulp.", "Add remaining ingredients. Serve as a salad, heaped on tomato slices, or as a dip for chips."]

title: Chicken Quesadillas
ingredients: ["1 large can white chicken breast chunks", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 1/2 cup grated cheese", "Onions", "Peppers", "Picante Sauce"]
instructions: ["Mix ingredients in bowl.", "Spread on tortillas.", "Fold tortilla and dampen edges.", "Cook in oven at 350 about 15 minutes in greased pan."]

title: Mexican Chicken And Rice
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. oil", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 small green pepper, chopped", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 1/2 c. Minute instant rice", "1 lb. boneless chicken", "1 pkg. frozen sweet corn", "1 c. mild salsa", "1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Heat oil in large skillet on medium high heat.", "Add chicken, onion and pepper.", "Cook and stir until chicken is cooked through. Add corn, broth and salsa; bring to boil.", "Stir in rice and cover. Remove from heat.", "Let stand 5 minutes.", "Fluff with a fork. Sprinkle with cheese.", "Let stand 2 minutes. Serve."]

title: Taco Bake
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground meat", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce", "15 1/2 oz. can corn (whole kernel), drained", "2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "2 c. Bisquick", "1 c. milk", "2 large eggs"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0 (375\u00b0 for high altitude).", "Brown meat and onion.", "Drain.", "Spoon into ungreased 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Stir in taco seasoning, tomato sauce and corn.", "Sprinkle cheese over top.", "Stir remaining ingredients until blended.", "Pour over beef mixture.", "Bake 35 minutes, until lightly browned.", "Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded lettuce."]

title: Meatless Mexican Beans
ingredients: ["12 to 14 oz. small red beans", "water", "1/3 pkg. chili mix", "2 cloves garlic, chopped", "1 medium size onion", "salt", "5 to 6 dashes mesquite liquid smoke", "hot Louisiana sauce (optional)"]
instructions: ["Cover beans with water plus 2 inches more.", "Soak beans 10 to 12 hours.", "Put in slow cooker.", "Add water to cover beans plus 2 inches more and add chili mix, garlic and onion.", "After 4 to 5 hours cooking, add liquid smoke and hot sauce.", "When beans are done, add salt.", "Do not heat beans in microwave as they get hard."]

title: Taco Pizza
ingredients: ["1 pkg. pizza dough mix", "1 can refried beans", "1 lb. hamburger, browned", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. shredded Mozzarella cheese", "shredded lettuce", "diced tomatoes", "diced onions", "Pace picante sauce"]
instructions: ["Prepare pizza dough.", "Spread in round pizza pan.", "Place pizza dough in oven to rise about 5 to 10 minutes; dough should not be moist at this time.", "Layer the following items in this order: refried beans, hamburger (browned), Cheddar cheese and Mozzarella cheese.", "Put pizza in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 15 minutes or until hot and cheese has melted.", "Sprinkle shredded lettuce completely over pizza along with tomatoes and onions.", "Spoon picante sauce over all the pizza (sour cream optional).", "Makes 2 to 4 servings."]

title: Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["2 lb. ground beef", "1 onion", "1 green pepper", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes", "1 tsp. chili powder", "1 bag Doritos", "1 c. grated Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef, onion and green pepper. Drain. Mix soups, tomatoes, chili powder and 1/2 cup cheese. In a 9 x 13 baking dish, cover bottom with crushed Doritos. Pour ground beef on top of Doritos, then pour soup mixture on top of ground beef. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Jalapeno Cornbread
ingredients: ["2 c. cream-style corn", "2/3 c. cooking oil", "1 1/2 to 2 c. grated Cheddar cheese", "1 (4 oz.) can jalapenos or green chilies, chopped and seeded", "2 c. cornbread mix", "2 c. sour cream or 1 c. milk", "1 c. chopped onion"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.", "Blend well.", "Pour into greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.", "Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 1 hour or until done."]

title: Taco Meat Balls
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "onion (if desired)"]
instructions: ["Mix and make into small balls.", "Cook in microwave for 3 minutes on High."]

title: Taco Pie
ingredients: ["1 pkg. crescent rolls", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. sour cream", "1 1/2 lb. ground chuck", "1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "2/3 c. water", "1 bag Doritos, crushed"]
instructions: ["Use a large glass pie dish or a 9 x 13-inch glass dish. Spread rolls to form crust.", "(Pam the pan first.)", "Brown meat and onion.", "Add taco seasoning and water.", "I bring to boil.", "Spread meat mixture over rolls.", "Spread sour cream over meat.", "Sprinkle cheese over sour cream.", "Top with crushed Doritos.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Serve with a salad."]

title: Vegetable Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 1/3 c. water", "1/2 c. dry lentils", "1/4 tsp. salt", "8 (6-inch) flour tortillas", "2 medium carrots, thinly sliced", "1 tsp. chili powder or cumin", "1 Tbsp. cooking oil", "1 medium zucchini, quartered and sliced", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) Mexican style tomatoes, cut up", "6 oz. Mozzarella"]
instructions: ["Simmer in covered saucepan the water, lentils and salt for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Drain, rinse and set aside.", "Stir-fry carrots and chili powder in hot oil for 2 minutes.", "Add zucchini; stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes or until crisp-tender.", "Stir in lentils, half the undrained tomatoes and half of the cheese.", "Spoon vegetable mixture onto tortillas.", "Place, seam side down, in prepared baking dish.", "Cover with foil.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 8 minutes.", "Remove foil.", "Bake for 7 to 12 minutes.", "Heat remaining tomatoes.", "Spoon over enchiladas.", "Top with cheese.", "Bake 1 minute."]

title: Mexican Meat Filling
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground chuck", "1 medium onion", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "1/8 tsp. cayenne", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. tomato sauce"]
instructions: ["In large skillet cook ground chuck, onion, garlic and cayenne over medium-high heat, stirring often until meat is no longer pink, about 5 minutes.", "Add chili powder, cumin and salt.", "Cook 1 minute.", "Add tomato sauce and cook, stirring often, until thickened, about 5 minutes."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["4 chicken breasts, boiled, boned and cut up", "14 to 16 corn tortillas or flour tortillas, if desired", "1 onion, chopped", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup", "1 1/2 c. milk", "1 small can green chilies, chopped", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. Monterey Jack cheese, shredded", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. Cheddar cheese, shredded"]
instructions: ["Dip each tortilla in hot grease just to soften.", "On each tortilla put some chicken, onion and cheese.", "Roll up and place in 9 x 13-inch pan which has been sprayed with nonstick spray.", "Mix the soup, milk and chilies and pour over the enchiladas.", "Top with additional onions and cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes or until hot."]

title: Mexican Corn
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. corn oil", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "2 cans cream-style corn", "1 can green chilies, chopped", "2 eggs, beaten", "3/4 c. corn meal", "2 c. grated cheese"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients except cheese and chilies.", "Mix well. Pour 1/2 corn mixture into a greased long casserole dish. Sprinkle chilies over mixture.", "Top with 1/2 cheese.", "Repeat corn mixture and cheese.", "Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 until set, about 45 minutes.", "It thickens some as it cools."]

title: Velveeta Salsa Dip
ingredients: ["1 lb. Velveeta, cubed", "1 (8 oz.) jar Pace picante sauce or salsa", "2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro (optional)"]
instructions: ["Stir Velveeta and salsa in saucepan over low heat until Velveeta is melted.", "Stir in cilantro.", "Serve hot with tortilla chips or vegetable dippers.", "Makes 3 cups."]

title: Cheese Salsa Dip
ingredients: ["1 lb. Velveeta cheese", "1 (8 oz.) jar picante or salsa sauce", "2 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)", "tortilla chips or vegetable dippers"]
instructions: ["Microwave cheese and picante sauce in a 1 1/2 quart microwavable bowl on High for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted, stirring after 3 minutes.", "Stir in cilantro.", "Serve hot with tortilla chips or vegetable dippers.", "Yield: 3 cups."]

title: Chicken Fajita Sandwiches
ingredients: ["1/4 c. lime juice", "2 tsp. finely chopped garlic", "1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "dash of liquid red pepper seasoning", "4 boneless, skinned chicken breast halves (about 1 lb.)", "1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 large onion, sliced", "1 sweet green pepper, sliced", "4 slices Monterey Jack cheese", "4 rectangular club rolls or small submarine rolls, split", "1 1/4 c. shredded lettuce (optional)", "1/3 c. bottled salsa (optional)"]
instructions: ["Combine lime juice, garlic, cumin and red pepper seasoning in medium-size bowl.", "Add chicken.", "Refrigerate covered for 30 to 60 minutes."]

title: Taco Dip Ambrosino
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 jar taco sauce (hot or mild, to taste)", "1 lb. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 large tomato, chopped small", "1 large avocado, chopped small", "1 can black olives, chopped small", "1/2 c. fresh parsley, chopped small"]
instructions: ["Cream together with a fork cream cheese and cottage cheese until blended.", "Layer mixture in bottom of a glass pie plate or serving bowl/plate.", "Add layer of taco sauce, vegetables and Cheddar.", "Alternate layers until supplies are exhausted. Finish with Cheddar and garnish with parsley.", "Serve with taco chips to scoop."]

title: Quick Taco Salad
ingredients: ["3/4 lb. lean ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 pkg. Rice-A-Roni beef flavor", "1/2 c. salsa", "1 tsp. chili powder", "4 c. shredded lettuce", "1 medium tomato chopped", "1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. crushed tortilla chips"]
instructions: ["Step 1:", "In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion. Drain.", "Remove from skillet.", "Set aside."]

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ["1 head lettuce", "1 or 2 tomatoes, diced", "1 can Ranch Style beans, drained", "1 small pkg. Fritos, crushed", "Cheddar cheese", "1 small bottle Italian dressing"]
instructions: ["Pinch lettuce in small pieces.", "Combine all other ingredients except Fritos.", "Add them just before serving."]

title: Mexican Lasagna
ingredients: ["2 lb. ground meat (beef, turkey, chicken, venison)", "1 medium onion, chopped", "4 oz. chopped chilies", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "16 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese", "2 (16 oz.) jars salsa (1 mild and 1 medium)", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. large flour tortillas"]
instructions: ["Cook meat and onion until brown; drain fat.", "Add taco seasoning mix to meat mixture.", "Add chilies.", "Cut tortillas into thirds.", "In a 9 x 13-inch pan, layer salsa, meat, cheese and tortillas in that order.", "End with layer of tortillas topped with cheese.", "Cover with foil and bake for 35 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Fiesta Onion Salsa
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped sweet onion", "3 Tbsp. sliced ripe olives", "2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. ground cumin", "1/8 tsp. hot sauce", "3/4 c. chopped tomato", "1 (4.5 oz.) can chopped green chiles, drained", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients; cover and chill at least 2 hours. Serve with vegetables, fish, chicken or tortilla chips.", "Yield: 2 cups."]

title: Chicken Enchilada(Microwave)
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. diced, cooked chicken", "1 (15 oz.) can evaporated milk", "1 can condensed cream of chicken soup", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 can chopped green chillies, drained", "6 corn tortillas, torn", "3/4 c. grated cheese"]
instructions: ["In 2-quart casserole, mix all the ingredients.", "Microwave on High for 11 to 13 minutes.", "Rotate dish 1/2 turn; cook 5 minutes."]

title: Tamale Pie Casserole
ingredients: ["2 small cans tamales", "1 large can Chili without beans", "1 large bag of Fritos", "1 white onion, chopped", "1 jar Velveeta cheese", "jalapenos in oil, optional", "1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Butter casserole dish.", "Spread ingredients in layers (Chili, cheese, Fritos, onion, tamales, cheese then repeat.)"]

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. sour cream", "1/2 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded", "1 small onion", "1 tomato, sliced", "2 c. shredded lettuce"]
instructions: ["Cream the cheese and sour cream and spread on a platter.", "Add the taco seasoning to taste.", "Chop and spread on the cream cheese mixture: onion, lettuce and tomato.", "Spread the Cheddar cheese over the top.", "Use real \"nachos\" or Tostitos with dip."]

title: Mexican Fiesta Pie
ingredients: ["3 c. corn tortilla chips", "15 oz. can chili with beans", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 c. shredded Cheddar, American or Monterey Jack cheese", "shredded or chopped lettuce", "tomatoes and olives"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Lightly grease a 9-inch square pan or 1 1/2-quart shallow casserole dish.", "Layer half the corn chips, chili, onion and cheese in pan; repeat.", "Bake, uncovered, at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until hot.", "Garnish with lettuce, tomatoes and olives.", "Makes 4 servings."]

title: "Cheaters" Mexican Bake
ingredients: ["1 (10 count) pkg. beef and bean frozen burritos, thaw and cut into thirds", "12 oz. jar medium chunky salsa", "15 oz. can beef chili without beans", "2 c. grated cheese"]

title: Chicken Taco Casserole
ingredients: ["4 medium to large chicken breasts", "3 cans cream of chicken soup", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1/4 c. sliced jalapeno pepper", "1/4 c. sliced green pepper", "1 large bag Doritos/tortilla chips", "12 oz. Cheddar cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Boil chicken breasts.", "(Skin, debone and tear into small pieces.)", "Mix chicken pieces, cream of chicken soup (not diluted), onions and peppers.", "Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan with corn oil. Layer chips, soup mixture and cheese until soup mixture is gone. Final layer of chips and sprinkle top with cheese.", "Cover with foil.", "Cook at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Remove foil; cook for 5 more minutes.", "Allow to cool for 10 minutes and serve."]

title: Mexican Cornbread
ingredients: ["2 boxes Jiffy cornbread mix", "1 (17 oz.) can cream-style corn", "1 lb. browned hamburger meat", "1 (8 oz.) jar mild picante sauce", "2 c. shredded cheese"]
instructions: ["Mix one cornbread mix according to directions on box and add 1/2 can corn.", "Put in bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Layer hamburger, picante sauce, cheese and the other cornbread mix, mixed according to directions, adding the other half of the corn. Bake at 400\u00b0 until golden brown.", "Serve immediately."]

title: Mexican Cornbread
ingredients: ["2 pkg. plain cornbread mix", "1 pkg. Mexican cornbread mix", "1 lb. ground meat", "1/2 onion, chopped", "1 can whole corn, drained", "1 pkg. cheese"]
instructions: ["Brown meat and onion; drain excess fat and set aside.", "Combine cornbread mixes together according to directions on box. Additionally, add 1/3 cup milk and can of corn to the cornbread mixes.", "Using a nonstick spray, prepare a 9 x 13-inch baking pan. Pour a small amount of cornbread batter in pan to form a layer. Sprinkle meat mixture on top and then sprinkle grated cheese on top of the meat.", "Pour remaining cornbread mix on top of all and bake according to box directions."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger, browned and drained", "2 cans kidney beans, drained", "1 head lettuce, broken up", "tomatoes (as many as desired)", "1 pkg. Doritos, broken up", "salt and pepper", "olives", "8 oz. grated sharp cheese", "1 bottle French dressing"]
instructions: ["Toss all ingredients together."]

title: Mmmmm Impossible Taco Pie
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onions", "1 envelope taco seasoning mix", "1 can refried beans", "3/4 c. Bisquick", "1 1/4 c. milk", "3 eggs", "1 c. shredded cheese", "chopped tomatoes, lettuce, sour cream", "favorite taco sauce or salsa"]
instructions: ["Cook ground beef, onions and seasoning mix together until meat turns color; drain.", "Put in a greased 8 x 8-inch square pan. Spread beans on top of meat.", "Mix Bisquick, milk and eggs; pour over beans.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 until brown.", "Sprinkle cheese on top and put back into oven until cheese is melted.", "Serve with remaining ingredients."]

title: Tortilla Pinwheels
ingredients: ["8 oz. sour cream", "8 oz. cream cheese", "4 oz. diced green chilies, drained", "4 oz. chopped black olives, drained", "1 c. grated Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. chopped green onion", "garlic powder to taste", "seasoned salt to taste", "5 (10-inch) flour tortillas", "salsa sauce"]
instructions: ["Mix all together.", "Spread over tortillas; roll up.", "Wrap tightly in plastic.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Cut 1/2 to 3/4-inch and serve with salsa."]

title: American Meat Loaf
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. lean ground beef", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "1/2 c. seasoned dry bread crumbs", "1/4 c. finely chopped onions", "1/3 c. milk", "1/4 c. Heinz 57 sauce", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["Thoroughly combine all ingredients and shape into a loaf pan (8 x 4 x 1 1/2-inches).", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 1 hour.", "Allow meat loaf to stand 5 minutes before slicing.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Mexican Taco Dip
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 large container sour cream", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 medium size jar salsa sauce", "chopped lettuce", "chopped red or green peppers", "chopped tomatoes", "chopped black olives", "chopped onions (if desired)", "1 large pkg. Cheddar cheese, Monterey Jack or Taco Mix cheese, grated", "1 large bag white corn tortilla chips"]
instructions: ["Mix cream cheese, sour cream and taco seasoning all together. Shape into a mound on a plate.", "Spread salsa sauce over top. Sprinkle chopped ingredients over top.", "Sprinkle cheese over top last.", "Serve chilled with corn tortilla chips."]

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ["2 lb. hamburger", "1 bell pepper, chopped", "1 onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "salt to taste", "2 lb. Velveeta cheese", "1 can diced Ro-Tel", "1 (11 oz.) bag Fritos", "1 head lettuce, shredded", "2 large tomatoes, chopped"]
instructions: ["Saute hamburger, pepper and onion together until meat is brown. Add seasonings and keep mixture warm.", "Melt cheese and Ro-Tel together.", "Keep warm.", "In individual salad bowls, layer Fritos, meat, lettuce and tomatoes.", "Cover with cheese sauce."]

title: Italian Torta
ingredients: ["1 qt. plus 1/3 c. hot milk", "3/4 loaf Italian sliced bread, broken in pieces", "3 eggs", "1 c. sugar", "4 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. raisins", "1 medium apple, grated", "3 Tbsp. brandy"]
instructions: ["Soak bread in hot milk.", "Set aside.", "Beat together eggs and sugar.", "Add to soaked bread/milk mixture.", "Add vanilla, raisins and grated apple.", "Add brandy last.", "Bake in well-greased pan at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Enchilada Bake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat", "1 can refried beans", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 can enchilada sauce", "1 can mushroom soup", "1 to 2 pkg. large flour tortillas", "grated cheese (I use American)"]
instructions: ["Cook meat, mix in refried beans, taco seasoning mix until hot and blended. Mix enchilada sauce and soup together, warm.", "Put meat mixture in middle of tortilla, roll and place in greased baking dish. Pour sauce mixture over rolled tortillas, sprinkle with cheese and bake until bubbly."]

title: America'S Pot Roast
ingredients: ["3 1/2 to 4 lb. boneless pot roast", "1/4 c. flour", "2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "3 carrots, pared and sliced into 2 inch pieces", "3 potatoes, peeled", "2 small onions", "1 jar mushroom gravy", "1/4 c. water", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 stalk celery"]
instructions: ["Trim all fat from roast, brown and drain.", "Combine 1/4 cup flour, salt and pepper.", "Coat meat with flour mixture.", "Place all vegetables except mushrooms in crock-pot and top with roast. Cover and cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours.", "Makes 4 to 6 servings."]

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["1 sm. carton Sour Cream", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. Cream Cheese", "1 sm. jar Picante Sauce", "8 oz. grated Monterey Jack Cheese with peppers", "8 oz. Cheddar Cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Mix sour cream and cream cheese.", "Spread on a cake plate. Pour picante sauce over and sprinkle cheeses on top."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 large onion", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix (any brand)", "1 large head lettuce", "2 large tomatoes", "1 large pkg. grated Cheddar cheese", "1 large bag Doritos", "1 medium size bottle Italian salad dressing"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef; drain.", "Chill enough so it does not wilt lettuce.", "Chop onion and tomatoes.", "Cut lettuce to salad size.", "In large bowl, combine lettuce, onion, tomatoes and taco mix.", "Add beef.", "Crunch up the Doritos and add to mixture.", "Pour dressing over salad just before serving."]

title: Skillet Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef, chicken or turkey", "1/2 c. chopped onions", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup", "1 (10 oz.) can enchilada sauce", "1/3 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. seeded chopped canned green chillies or 1 can diced green chillies", "8 tortillas", "cooking oil", "2 1/2 c. shredded sharp cheese", "1/2 c. chopped pitted olives"]

title: Mexican Corn Bread

title: Fresh Salsa - Quickly

title: Taco Salad

title: Mexican Salsa

title: Mexican Pinwheels

title: Taco Salad

title: Avocado Dip

title: Tuna Burritos
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. water", "2 lb. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "3 tsp. butter", "1/2 c. salt", "3 cans tuna", "1 c. oil"]
instructions: ["Mix the flour, baking powder, water, butter and salt to make the dough.", "Knead the dough into a soft mass.", "Form the mass like a Mexican tortilla.", "For each made-up tortilla, add some tuna; fold them in half and, with a fork, pinch the edges to tighten.", "Deep fry until golden brown."]

title: White Sauce(Salsa Balsamella)
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. unsalted butter", "1/2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt to taste", "1/8 tsp. white pepper", "2 1/2 c. milk, room temperature"]
instructions: ["In saucepan, melt", "butter.", "When", "butter foams, stir in flour, salt and pepper.", "Cook and stir 2 minutes until mixture bubbles. Add milk all at once.", "Stir constantly while mixture thickens. Makes 2 1/2 cups sauce."]

title: Light Tortilla Chips
ingredients: ["8 (6-inch) corn tortillas", "2 c. water"]
instructions: ["Pour water into shallow dish. Dip tortillas into water for 2 seconds (do 1 at a time). Drain. Cut each tortilla into 8 wedges. Place tortilla wedges in a single layer on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until lightly browned. Yield: 8 servings."]

title: Avocado Salad
ingredients: ["1 small lemon Jell-O", "1 1/2 c. boiling water", "1 1/2 c. mashed avocado", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. Miracle Whip", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of Tabasco sauce"]
instructions: ["Mix Jell-O in water; allow to cool.", "Mix in other ingredients."]

title: Jalapeno Cornbread
ingredients: ["3 c. cornbread mix (yes, mix)", "2 1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. salad oil", "3 eggs, beaten", "1 large onion, grated", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. cream-style corn", "1/2 c. yellow cheese, grated", "1/4 lb. bacon or more, fried crisp and crumbled", "1/4 c. pimientos, chopped", "1/4 c. garlic, chopped (optional)"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients together and bake in 3 greased 8 x 8-inch pans at 400\u00b0 until done and brown, about 35 minutes. Let cool; cut and enjoy with a tall glass of milk."]

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans", "1/4 tsp. ground cumin", "1 garlic clove, minced", "1/2 c. tomato paste", "1/2 small onion, chopped", "3 Tbsp. hot salsa"]
instructions: ["In a food processor fitted with the metal blade, process all ingredients except onion and salsa until pureed.", "Pour mixture into a bowl; stir in onion and salsa.", "Cover and refrigerate until chilled.", "Makes 1 cup."]

title: Easy Chicken Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: ["2 cans Swanson boned chicken", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 tall can Milnot", "1 small can chopped green chilies", "3 Tbsp. dried onion flakes"]
instructions: ["In a 9 x 13-inch dish, mix together.", "Crush a bag of Doritos in bottom of a pan.", "Pour mixture over Doritos.", "Top with grated cheese.", "Bake in 325\u00b0 oven for 30 minutes."]

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ["1 head lettuce, shredded", "tomatoes (as desired)", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 can Ranch Style beans", "1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated", "1 (8 oz.) bottle Catalina dressing", "1 medium size pkg. corn chips"]
instructions: ["Mix together.", "Pour on dressing when ready to eat."]

title: Stuffed Avocado
ingredients: ["3 avocados, halved lengthwise", "1 large carrot, diced small", "8 oz. peas", "8 oz. green beans, diced", "1 lb. potatoes, diced small", "1/4 c. oil", "2 eggs", "mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1 lemon, juice only", "1/2 tsp. mustard", "1 tooth of garlic", "salt to taste"]
instructions: ["Boil the cut-up carrot, peas, green beans and potatoes.", "Put the eggs in blender.", "Add a continuous thread of oil a little at a time.", "Add garlic, pepper, mustard and salt to taste and finally add lemon juice."]

title: Mexican Corn

instructions: ["Fix Rice-A-Roni as directed on box. Add remaining ingredients and pour into casserole dish. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 30 minutes."]

title: The Original Mexican Cornbread

instructions: ["Combine all ingredients, except cheese.", "Make sure sides and bottom of iron skillet are well-oiled.", "Pour 1/2 mixture in hot skillet.", "Add shredded cheese.", "Pour other 1/2 on top of cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Mexican Dinner
ingredients: ["2 lb. ground beef", "2 cans chopped green chilies", "2 cans chili beans", "3 cans tomato sauce", "2 cans water", "tostados or Fritos", "cheese"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef and drain.", "Add green chilies, beans, tomato sauce and water.", "Simmer 30 to 40 minutes.", "Line bowl with tostados.", "Add half of meat mixture, then layer of cheese, more meat and another layer of cheese.", "Top with tostados.", "Bake 30 to 35 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Nachos El Grande

instructions: ["Spread each chip used with 1 teaspoon of refried beans. Sprinkle grated cheese over them evenly and top with jalapeno ring.", "Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 until cheese has completely melted. Serve and enjoy."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 pouch dry onion soup mix", "1/2 c. water", "1 lettuce, torn", "tortilla chips", "1 medium tomato, chopped", "1 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded"]
instructions: ["Brown beef and chili powder in skillet.", "Drain off grease. Add soup mix and water.", "Bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat and cook 10 minutes, stirring often.", "On top of chips, add other ingredients. Top with cheese and tomatoes."]

title: Grilled Fish Tacos

instructions: ["Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone."]

instructions: ["Brown onion, green pepper, garlic and meat.", "Add beans, tomatoes, tomato sauce, chili powder, salt, bay leaves, paprika, cayenne pepper and Tabasco sauce.", "Cover and simmer for 1 1/2 hours.", "Serves 6."]

title: Mexican Wastebasket Soup
ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped onions", "1 can Ro-Tel diced tomatoes", "1 can green chiles", "2 cans whole kernel corn", "2 cans pinto beans", "1 can lima beans", "1 can black olives", "1 pkg. beef onion soup mix", "1 c. chopped celery", "2 pkg. small Smok-Y-Links sausage"]

title: Mexican Corn Bread

instructions: ["Mix together and pour in hot skillet. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

instructions: ["Brown ground beef and drain.", "Chop onion and peppers.", "Mix first seven ingredients and pour half into greased 9 x 9-inch pan or iron skillet.", "Layer meat, then onion and peppers and then cheese.", "Pour remainder of batter on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 or 60 minutes or until top is golden brown."]

title: Casserole Mexicana

title: Impossible Mexican Pie

instructions: ["Cook and stir beef and onion until brown; drain.", "Stir in flour, seasonings and tomato sauce.", "Spread mixture in pan. title: Turkey Tortilla Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "3 c. chopped turkey or chicken", "10 to 12 (6-inch) corn tortillas, torn into bite size pieces", "4 oz. can diced green chilies", "1 (10 3/4 oz.) can reduced sodium chicken soup", "1 tsp. pepper", "1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese", "1 c. salsa"]

title: Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["1 onion", "1/2 bell pepper", "1 1/2 lb. ground meat", "1 (No. 2) can corn", "1 (No. 2) can chili beans", "1/4 c. catsup", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "1 envelope cornbread mix"]
instructions: ["Saute onion, pepper and meat.", "Add seasonings; cook 15 minutes.", "Mix cornbread and pour over top.", "Bake 20 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Mexican Soup

title: Mexican Pinwheels

instructions: ["Mix first three ingredients.", "Spread on tortillas.", "Drain remaining ingredients and blot on paper towels.", "Spread equal amounts on cream cheese.", "Roll tightly.", "Chill 2 hours.", "Cut into 1-inch pieces.", "Discard ends.", "Serve facing up on dish or plate."]

title: Mexican Rice
ingredients: ["2 c. Minute rice", "2 c. water", "1 jar salsa", "shredded Cheddar cheese", "chopped green onion"]
instructions: ["Make rice according to package directions.", "Put in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Mix in salsa.", "Cover with cheese.", "Put in microwave long enough to melt cheese.", "Sprinkle with green onion.", "Makes good quick side dish.", "To stretch it, add more rice, small can tomato sauce, Taco Belle package sauce to taste if desired."]

title: Tacos Al Carbon

instructions: ["Place steak in a large shallow container.", "Combine oil, Burgundy, garlic powder, salt and pepper, mixing well.", "Pour over steak; cover and marinate in the refrigerator 8 hours, occasionally turning the steak.", "Wrap tortillas in aluminum foil and heat in a 325\u00b0 oven about 15 minutes.", "Cut avocado into cubes and dip in lime juice; set aside.", "Drain steak.", "Grill over hot coals 5 to 10 minutes on each side or", "until steak reaches desired degree of doneness.", "Slice steak diagonally across grain into thin slices.", "Wrap tortillas around sliced steak and serve with avocado, sour cream and Pico de Gallo.", "Yields 8 to 10 servings."]

title: Taco Meal

title: Zingy Tortilla Bites
ingredients: ["24 oz. cream cheese, softened", "2 c. sour cream", "10 green onions, chopped", "juice of 1/2 lime", "1 to 4 jalapenos, seeded and finely chopped", "1 (2 oz.) can chopped black olives, drained (optional)", "1 1/2 c. mayonnaise", "salt and pepper to taste", "20 large flour tortillas", "1 (16 oz.) jar medium picante sauce"]
instructions: ["Blend the cream cheese and sour cream in an electric mixer or processor.", "Add the next 7 ingredients and mix well.", "Spread the cream cheese mixture on each tortilla and roll up tightly as for jelly roll.", "Place the tortilla rolls on a tray and cover lightly with a damp towel and plastic wrap to prevent drying.", "Chill for 8 to 10 hours.", "Cut the tortilla rolls into 1/2 to 3/4-inch slices and arrange on a serving platter.", "Serve with the picante sauce. Yield:", "10 dozen."]

title: Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (7 oz.) can whole green chiles", "1 lb. (about 3 c.) sharp Cheddar cheese, grated", "1/2 lb. (about 2 c.) Monterey Jack cheese, grated", "4 eggs", "1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk", "salt and pepper to taste", "generous dash of hot pepper sauce", "1 bunch green onions, chopped"]
instructions: ["Split chiles", "and", "cover", "the", "bottom of a baking dish. Spread chiles", "with", "the grated cheeses.", "Stir eggs into milk. Season to taste", "with salt, pepper and hot pepper sauce; pour over cheese. At\tthis", "point,", "mixture", "may", "be\trefrigerated overnight.", "When ready", "to bake, top with green onions.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for", "35", "to 40 minutes or until casserole bubbles and puffs up."]

title: Taco Salad

instructions: ["Brown meat.", "Add taco seasoning, tomatoes and juice.", "Mix Cheddar cheese soup and milk together and add.", "Cook for 15 minutes.", "Cook rice according to directions.", "Line a dish with cooked rice.", "Add meat mixture.", "Top with 1 pound of cheese. title: Mexican Lasagna
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. lean ground beef", "1 pkg. Lawry's taco seasoning mix", "1 tsp. Bake, uncovered, in 350\u00b0 oven 20 to 30 minutes.", "Let stand for 10 minutes before cutting into squares."]

title: Enchilada Casserole

Continue until you fill dish with enchiladas.", "You may need two baking dishes by the time you use up all the mixture.", "Pour remaining sauce, cheese and hamburger over the top. title: Taco Soup
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 large onion", "1 can pinto beans", "1 can kidney beans", "1 can whole kernel corn", "1 can hominy, drained", "3 cans diced tomatoes", "1 small can green chilies", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch buttermilk dressing mix"]

title: Quick Enchiladas

title: Mexican Lasagna

title: Mexican Corn Casserole

title: Phil'S Easy Burritos

title: Cowboy Enchiladas

Tabasco sauce", "1/2 c. flour", "2 cans chicken broth (1 or more cans water)", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes, diced"]

title: Chicken Enchiladas

title: Mexican Chicken And Rice Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. chicken (breasts are better), cooked, deboned and diced (3 breasts)", "1 onion, sauteed in 1 Tbsp. oil", "1 c. broth", "1 c. salsa or 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes and chilies, diced", "1 c. uncooked Minute rice", "1 c. shredded cheese"]

title: Chicken Pie Mexican-Style

title: Taco Salad

title: Chicken Enchiladas

title: Taco Soup

Ranch dressing mix", "4 (16 oz.) cans diced tomatoes", "1 (15 to 16 oz.) can pinto beans (undrained)", "1 (15 to 16 oz.) can red kidney beans (undrained)", "1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn", "1 (4 oz.) can green chilies", "1/2 tsp. salt"]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground meat", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 tsp. salt", "1 small pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 small onion, diced", "1 pkg. cheese Doritos"]

title: Enchilada Pie
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 c. chopped onions", "1 clove garlic, minced", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 (4 1/2 oz.) can chopped black olives", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "6 corn tortillas, buttered", "2 c. grated Cheddar cheese", "2/3 c. water"]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 head lettuce, shredded", "1 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 pt. bottle Catalina salad dressing", "1 bag Fritos", "1 can chili beans, drained"]

title: Hot Taco Dip

title: Churros

title: Hot Mexican Potato Salad

title: Enchilada Casserole

title: Taco Soup

instructions: ["In crock-pot, melt cheese. Put in chicken, chicken broth, chicken soup, celery soup and Ro-Tel.", "Slice tortillas in small pieces and add to soup.", "Heat in crock-pot until hot!"]

title: Mexican Chicken And Rice
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. oil", "1 lb. chicken breast, chopped in squares", "1 onion, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "10 oz. pkg. sweet corn, thawed", "1 cup chicken broth, or 1 can", "1 cup mild Salsa, or 1 pint", "2 cups instant rice", "1/2 cup Cheddar cheese, shredded"]
instructions: ["Heat oil in large skillet on medium high heat.", "Add chicken, onion, and pepper.", "Cook and stir until chicken is cooked.", "Add corn, broth and salsa. Bring to a boil.", "Stir in the rice and cover.", "Remove from heat.", "Let stand for 5 minutes.", "Fluff with fork.", "Sprinkle with cheese and cover.", "Let stand 2 minutes or until cheese melts."]

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ["3 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) sour cream", "1 bottle taco sauce (for color)", "garlic powder", "chili powder"]
instructions: ["Note:", "Can use a package of taco mix instead of bottled taco sauce and garlic and chili powders."]

title: 7-Layer Avocado Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) can refried beans", "8 medium ripe avocados, mashed", "16 oz. grated cheese", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 pkg. taco mix", "2 medium tomatoes, chopped", "1 green onion, chopped", "4 oz. can chopped olives"]
instructions: ["Use medium ovenproof ceramic dish.", "Begin layers with beans on the bottom of the pan.", "Add avocado.", "Add a little lemon juice to avocado to prevent avocado from turning black.", "Mix sour cream and taco mix together, adding on top of avocado.", "Sprinkle grated cheese, tomatoes, green onions and olives.", "May be refrigerated if prepared ahead of time.", "Serve with tortilla chips."]

title: Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: ["12 or 18 taco shells", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. paprika", "1 1/2 c. milk", "1 (10 oz.) can mild enchilada sauce", "1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. olives", "4 oz. can mushrooms", "1 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can refried beans", "1 tomato, chopped"]
instructions: ["Combine flour, salt and paprika.", "Stir in milk.", "Microcook, uncovered, 2 minutes.", "Stir.", "Cook until bubbly 4 to 5 minutes."]

title: Taco Beef Soup
ingredients: ["1 pkg. taco mix", "1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 1/2 c. water", "16 oz. can tomatoes", "16 oz. can kidney beans", "8 oz. can tomato sauce", "1/2 c. onion, chopped", "shredded Cheddar cheese", "sour cream", "Tostitos"]
instructions: ["Brown beef and onion; drain fat.", "Add water, tomatoes, beans, tomato sauce and taco mix.", "Simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Serve hot; top with cheese and sour cream.", "Dip Tostitos."]

title: Taco Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "chopped onion", "1 can tomatoes", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "taco seasoning", "shredded cheese", "cooked noodles"]
instructions: ["Brown meat and onion; drain.", "Add tomatoes, mushroom soup, taco seasoning and 1 cup of cheese; mix well.", "Combine with cooked noodles; bake in a casserole dish at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 45 minutes."]

title: Guacamole Salad Or Dip
ingredients: ["2 ripe avocados, mashed", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 to 2 chopped tomatoes", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. lemon juice*", "dash of Worcestershire sauce"]
instructions: ["*I prefer juice of a real lemon, not the bottled stuff."]

title: Quesadillas
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 onion, chopped", "1 can green chiles (small can)", "1 can water (small can)", "1 pkg. Casa Fiesta taco seasoning mix", "1 can refried beans (last)", "sharp Cheddar cheese", "tortilla shells"]
instructions: ["Brown beef and onion. Drain grease. Add remaining ingredients (except for refried beans). Simmer 30 minutes on low heat. Add refried beans. Simmer 15 minutes. Fill tortilla shells. Add grated sharp Cheddar cheese. Broil until cheese melts."]

title: Famous Fajitas
ingredients: ["6 to 8 pork steaks, cut in strips", "2 large cloves garlic, minced", "1 medium onion", "2 to 4 green, red or yellow bell peppers", "cilantro to taste", "green chiles (optional)", "1 pkg. Lawry's fajita mix", "oil", "tortillas", "sour cream (topping)"]
instructions: ["Brown garlic, peppers, onion and cilantro in skillet.", "Remove and drain.", "Stir-fry pork strips in same skillet.", "When almost done, add vegetables, fajita mix and 1 glass of water.", "Stir and simmer 10 to 15 minutes.", "Fill tortillas or just set it all out and let them make their own.", "Great with guacamole, pico or other Mexican side dishes."]

title: Burritos
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat", "1 onion, chopped", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "3/4 c. water", "1 can refried beans", "1 pkg. flour tortillas", "1 can chili", "1/2 c. water", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Cook hamburger meat and onion until browned; drain well.", "Add taco seasoning and 3/4 cup water; mix well.", "Add refried beans; mix well.", "Put filling into each flour tortilla.", "Place in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch dish with the seam side down.", "Cover with the chili mixed with the 1/2 cup water.", "Add cheese and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until cheese melts."]

title: Jalapeno Rice
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. cooked and cooled rice", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 (4 oz.) can green chilies", "8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Mix rice with sour cream and green chilies.", "In a 1 1/2 to 2-quart casserole dish, layer 1/2 of the rice mixture and 1/2 of the cheese.", "Repeat, ending with cheese. Bake 30 minutes, covered, then remove lid and bake for an additional 10 minutes."]

title: Mexican Cornbread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. self-rising corn meal", "1 can yellow cream-style corn", "1 1/2 c. ground onion", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "dash of garlic salt", "3 pods hot pepper (ground)", "3 eggs", "1/2 c. oil", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sweet milk"]
instructions: ["Blend ingredients until well mixed.", "Put in heavy skillet or baking dish.", "Cook at 350\u00b0 until bread is firm for about 1 hour."]

title: Mexican Rice
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. water", "1 (10 oz.) can tomatoes and green chili peppers, cut up", "1 (8 3/4 oz.) can corn, drained", "1 c. long grain rice", "1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules", "1/2 tsp. onion, minced", "1/2 c. sour cream"]
instructions: ["In a medium saucepan, bring water to boiling.", "Stir in tomatoes and green chilies, corn, rice, chicken bouillon granules and onion.", "Turn into a 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish.", "Cover and bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until rice is tender. Spoon sour cream down center of rice.", "Serves 8."]

title: Jalapeno Jelly
ingredients: ["2 c. bell peppers, chopped fine", "1 jalapeno pepper (more if you like it hotter)", "6 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. white vinegar", "1 (6 oz.) bottle Certo"]
instructions: ["Seed peppers and chop fine.", "Mix peppers, sugar and vinegar. Boil 1 minute.", "Cool 5 minutes.", "Add Certo and stir.", "Pour into hot jars and seal."]

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 pkg. dry taco powder", "shredded lettuce", "tomatoes, cut in small pieces", "shredded Cheddar cheese", "finely minced onions"]
instructions: ["With a mixer, beat the cream cheese, sour cream and dry taco powder until smooth.", "Spread on plate.", "Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and onions.", "Put in refrigerator for 4 to 6 hours.", "Serve with taco chips."]

title: Mexican Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ["1 chicken hen (about 4 lb.) or 3 whole chicken breasts", "2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. pepper", "1 bay leaf", "1 can condensed cream of chicken soup", "1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can Ro-Tel tomatoes with green chilies", "1/2 c. chicken stock", "additional salt and pepper", "12 tortillas, torn in small pieces", "2 onions, finely chopped", "3 c. grated sharp cheese (about 3/4 lb.)"]
instructions: ["Cook chicken in water to which has been added 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper and bay leaf.", "Remove cooked chicken; reserve 1/2 cup of the chicken stock.", "Cut chicken into large bite size pieces.", "Set aside.", "Combine soups, tomatoes, chicken stock, additional salt and pepper to taste.", "Mix well."]

title: Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 can cream of mushroom", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes with green chilies", "1 can cheese soup", "1 can chili beans", "1 bag Doritos (nacho cheese flavor)", "grated cheese"]
instructions: ["Brown meat and onion.", "Add all ingredients, except Doritos and cheese.", "Line baking dish with chips.", "Pour mixture over chips. Cover with cheese and bake a short time, until bubbly and cheese melts good."]

title: Mexican Bean Salad(An Excellent Salad For Any Time Of The Year; Makes 4 Servings)
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice", "1 Tbsp. wine vinegar", "1/4 c. olive oil", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 1/2 Tbsp. finely chopped bell pepper", "1 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley", "1 c. chopped celery", "pinch of thyme", "1/4 tsp. dried oregano", "1 can kidney beans, drained (16 oz.)"]
instructions: ["Blend all ingredients and marinate for two hours or more before serving."]

title: Camarones Enchiladas(Serving Size:  8)
ingredients: ["2 lb. peeled and washed shrimp", "1 large chopped onion", "6 cloves crushed garlic", "1 large chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. each: chopped cilantro and parsley", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 tsp. Worcestershire", "1 (7 oz.) jar chopped red pimento", "1/2 tsp. Tabasco", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. dry white wine", "1/2 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 bay leaves", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper"]
instructions: ["Saute shrimp in a little oil until rosey.", "Set aside.", "Saute onion, garlic and green pepper.", "Add remaining ingredients and simmer 25 minutes.", "Add shrimp and simmer another 5 minutes. Serve over rice."]

title: Ham Tortillas With Picante Mayonnaise
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. picante sauce", "2 flour tortillas (8-inch), warmed", "4 thin slices ham", "3 lettuce leaves, shredded", "1 small tomato, diced"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In a cup, combine mayonnaise and picante sauce.", "Spread 1/2 mixture evenly over each tortilla.", "Top each with two slices of ham.", "Spread remaining sauce evenly over the ham.", "Pile the lettuce and tomato evenly on the sauce.", "Fold and bake for 5 minutes or until sauce bubbles.", "Cool for 1 minute. Serves 2."]

title: Taco Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 (15 oz.) can chili beans", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "2 Tbsp. taco sauce", "2 to 4 tsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "2 c. coarsely broken tortilla chips", "1 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. sliced chopped green onions", "1 large chopped tomato", "1 c. shredded cheese"]
instructions: ["Cook and stir ground beef until brown; drain.", "Stir in beans, tomato sauce, taco sauce, chili powder and garlic salt.", "Heat to boiling.", "Place chips in 2-quart casserole baking dish.", "Top with beef mixture.", "Spread on sour cream.", "Sprinkle with onions, tomato and cheese.", "Cook, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 until bubbly, about 20 to 30 minutes.", "Serve on chips or lettuce."]

title: Mock Enchilada
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "2 Tbsp. fat", "1/3 c. onion, chopped", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 can chili con carne", "1 pkg. corn chips", "1/2 lb. American Cheddar cheese, diced"]
instructions: ["Brown beef in hot fat.\tAdd", "onion and cook until soft. Mix in salt, pepper and chili.", "Place alternate layers of corn chips, chili mixture and cheese in a greased casserole, ending with corn chips.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Low Fat Turkey Quesadillas
ingredients: ["6 flour tortillas", "1 medium onion, chopped", "2 tsp. oil", "1 pepper, chopped", "1 1/4 lb. ground turkey", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. tomato sauce", "1 jalapeno pepper, chopped", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "1 tsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. oregano", "2 Tbsp. parsley", "3/4 tsp. cilantro", "1/2 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese", "1 c. salsa"]
instructions: ["Wrap tortillas in foil and warm at 350\u00b0.", "Heat oil in pan. Add onion and pepper for 5 minutes.", "Add turkey and brown, then all the seasonings, jalapeno and tomato sauce.", "Heat through at 450\u00b0.", "Place tortilla on cookie sheet.", "Top with turkey and cheese.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes.", "Serve with salsa."]

title: Beef Taco Bake
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef, turkey or venison", "1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed tomato soup", "1 cup salsa", "1/2 cup milk", "1 cup shredded cheddar cheese", "6 flour tortillas (cut into 1 inch pieces)"]
instructions: ["In skillet, over medium heat, cook meat until brown. Drain. Add soup, salsa, milk, tortillas and half of the cheese.", "Spoon into 2 quart shallow baking dish.", "Cover.", "Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until hot.", "Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Serves 4."]

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cans refried beans", "1 large size carton sour cream", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 container guacamole, thinned with lemon juice or 2 ripe avocados, mashed, with lemon juice", "grated Cheddar cheese", "chopped tomato"]
instructions: ["Mix sour cream with taco seasoning mix.", "On round plate, layer the following: refried beans, guacamole, sour cream with seasoning mix, grated cheese and chopped tomato.", "Chill and serve with chips."]

title: Apple Burritos Casserole
ingredients: ["15 to 20 (6-inch) flour tortillas", "2 large cans apple pie filling", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1 1/2 sticks oleo", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. water", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
instructions: ["Mix together the pie filling, 2 teaspoons of cinnamon and nutmeg.", "Place a spoonful in a flour tortilla and roll, closing both ends.", "Place in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish."]

title: Mexican Lasagna
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef, browned", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 tsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "1 c. diced tomatoes (fresh or canned)", "2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce", "1 can diced green chili", "1 c. cottage or Ricotta cheese", "2 beaten eggs", "12 corn tortillas", "2 1/2 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese"]
instructions: ["Add first 6 ingredients and simmer 10 minutes.", "Mix remaining ingredients, except Monterey Jack cheese and tortillas, together. Layer 1/2 meat mixture and top with 1/2 shells.", "Spread cheese mixture.", "Add 1/2 Monterey Jack cheese.", "Repeat layers.", "Bake uncovered 20 to 30 minutes at 350\u00b0 in 9 x 13-inch pan."]

title: Taco Seasoning Mix
ingredients: ["2 tsp. chili powder", "dash oregano", "dash onion salt", "small amount of salt and pepper", "any other spices you like"]
instructions: ["Mix all together.", "It makes the equivalent of one package of taco seasoning."]

title: Ten Layer Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["2 cans bean dip", "1 (12 oz.) carton sour cream", "1 pkg. dry taco seasoning mix", "1 can small cooked shrimp", "1 small can chopped black olives", "3/4 c. mild or medium salsa", "3/4 c. chopped green onion", "1 c. chopped fresh tomatoes", "1/2 lb. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 1/2 c. guacamole"]
instructions: ["In the bottom of a large platter, spread all of the bean dip. The next layer will be the sour cream. Top that layer with the guacamole.", "Next sprinkle the taco seasoning mix.", "On top of that, will be the shrimp layer. The black olives go on top of the shrimp.", "Spoon the salsa over the olive layer.", "Next make a layer using the chopped green onions.", "On top of the green onions, you will make a layer of chopped tomatoes.", "The last layer will be the shredded Cheddar cheese.", "You may omit any layer that you personally do not care for."]

title: Salsa
ingredients: ["4 c. tomatoes, peeled, cored, chopped (2 1/2 lbs)", "2 c. green peppers, seeded, chopped (1 lb.)", "1 c. hot peppers, seeded, chopped (1/2 lb.)", "3/4 c. onion, chopped", "1 tsp. salt", "2 cloves garlic", "1 1/2 c. cider vinegar"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients in a large sauce pan.", "Bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 20 minutes.", "Pour hot into hot jars leaving 1/4 inch head space.", "Adjust lids. Process 30 minutes in boiling water canner.", "Makes about 6 half pints."]

title: Creamy Tacos
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. hamburger", "1 lb. Velveeta", "1 (16 oz.) can chili beans", "2 (16 oz.) Mexican beans", "1/2 can Ro-Tel", "sour cream"]
instructions: ["Brown hamburger and drain.", "Add other ingredients to hamburger and simmer until smooth and creamy.", "Pour over chips (tortilla) and top with chopped lettuce, tomato, onions, etc."]

title: Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: ["1 pkg. 6-inch flour tortillas", "1 lb. ground meat", "1 onion, chopped", "1 can RoTel", "1 lb. grated Monterey Jack cheese", "1 can enchilada sauce", "1 small can chopped jalapeno", "8 oz. sour cream"]
instructions: ["Brown meat with onion and drain.", "Add RoTel, enchilada sauce and jalapenos.", "Simmer for 15 minutes over medium heat.", "Spray 9-inch x 13-inch casserole dish with no stick cooking spray. Layer tortillas, meat mixture, and cheese.", "Will make two layers. Bake at 350\u00b0 until cheese bubbles.", "Serve with sour cream."]

title: Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["2 tbsp. olive oil", "1 cup chopped onions", "2 cloves of garlic, minced", "1 lb. of lean ground beef", "1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes", "1 pkg. Lawry's or Taco Bell taco seasoning", "1 (4 oz.) can of diced green chilies", "1 (4 oz.) can of chopped black olives", "1 (12 - 15 oz.) bag tortilla chips, cheese flavored", "1 lb. mozzarella cheese, grated", "1 pint of cream cheese", "1 cup of shredded cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Heat the oil in a large skillet, add onions and saute for 3 minutes. Add crumbled ground beef. Toss in the minced garlic and cook until beef is done. Stir in the tomatoes (drain juice, save for later), taco seasoning, green chilies, and olives. Simmer for 10 minutes. Pour into a 10 x 15 oven safe dish. Use 1/2 of the tortilla chips, slightly crushed. Top with 1/2 the juice from the tomatoes. Add a layer of mozzarella and top with sour cream. Put another layer of tortilla chips (saving just a few for topping), then another layer of juice, mozzarella and sour cream. Top with a thin layer of crushed tortilla chips. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and add the 1 cup of cheddar cheese over all. Return to oven and bake until cheese melts. Remove dish from oven and let set for 5 minutes."]

title: Mexican Cornbread Salad
ingredients: ["3 c. crumbled Mexican cornbread", "1 (15 oz.) can crowder peas, drained", "1/2 c. chopped smoked sausage", "1/2 c. chopped cucumber", "1/2 c. chopped fresh tomato", "1/3 c. mayonnaise (or to taste)", "1/3 c. French onion dip (sour cream base)", "Shredded lettuce"]
instructions: ["Combine crumbled cornbread, peas, sausage, cucumber and tomato.", "Toss to mix.", "In small bowl, combine mayonnaise and dip. Mix well and add to cornbread mixture, stirring until well mixed. Spoon onto a bed of shredded lettuce", "Makes about 8 servings."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger meat", "1 packet taco seasoning", "lettuce", "tomato", "cheese", "Doritos"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef; add taco seasoning.", "Simmer.", "Chop tomato and lettuce; shred cheese.", "Put crushed Doritos on plate.", "Add meat, then top with salad.", "Picante sauce or sour cream can be used as topping."]

title: Easy Taco Pie
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef, browned with chopped onion", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 (4 oz.) can green chilies", "3/4 c. Bisquick", "1 1/4 c. sweet milk", "3 eggs", "1 c. Cheddar cheese or Monterey Jack"]
instructions: ["Grease 10-inch pie plate. Stir taco mix into beef and put in pie plate. Mix milk, eggs and Bisquick; pour over meat. Bake about 25 minutes at 400\u00b0 or until brown. The last 5 minutes of cooking, sprinkle cheese on top and let it melt. Very good."]

title: Mexican Cornbread
ingredients: ["1 c. cornmeal", "1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. sugar", "3/4 c. sweet corn", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. cheese", "1 c. milk", "1 pod hot pepper", "1 medium onion"]
instructions: ["Mix all together.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: American Shortcake
ingredients: ["1 c. blueberries", "6 c. strawberries, sliced", "2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar", "2 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. grated orange rind", "1/3 c. shortening", "3/4 c. milk", "sweetened whipped cream or frozen whipped topping"]
instructions: ["Mix berries with sugar; set aside.", "Mix dry ingredients with rind and cut in shortening until crumbly.", "Stir in milk just until blended.", "Turn out on lightly floured surface and knead 10 to 12 times.", "Pat out to 1/2-inch thickness and cut into 3-inch circles. Place 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 450\u00b0 until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes.", "Split and fill with whipped cream and berries."]

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["bean dip", "green chile salsa", "guacamole", "sour cream", "grated cheese", "chopped olives", "chopped tomatoes"]
instructions: ["Starting with bean dip layer all ingredients.", "Serve with tortilla chips."]

title: Enchilada Bake
ingredients: ["2 lb. ground chuck", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 can refried beans", "1 can sweet peas, drained", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "salsa", "flour tortilla shells", "2 lb. box Velveeta", "1 small can Ro-Tel", "1 small can chopped chilies", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can Cheddar cheese soup", "sour cream", "black olives", "mushrooms"]

Fold side down.", "Fill cake pan with enchiladas."]

title: Mexican Cornbread
ingredients: ["3 c. cornmeal", "3 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped onion", "1 c. creamed corn", "2 Tbsp. jalapeno peppers", "1 1/2 c. shredded cheese", "1 c. oil (little more or little less)", "1 1/2 c. sweet milk", "3 eggs"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 until golden brown."]

title: Chicken Quesadillas With Fiesta Rice
ingredients: ["1 pound boneless chicken breasts", "1 can Campbell's Cheddar Cheese soup", "1/2 cup salsa or Picante Sauce", "10 - 8 inch flour tortillas"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 425\u00b0. Cook chicken in nonstick skillet until done and juices evaporate, stirring often. Add soup and salsa and heat through. Spread about 1/3 cup soup mixture on half of each tortilla to within 1/2 inch of edge. Moisten edge with water. Fold over and seal. Place on baking sheet. Bake 5 minutes or until hot. Serve with rice."]

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ["1 head lettuce, shredded", "2 tomatoes, chopped", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 lb. cheddar cheese, grated", "1 (11 oz.) pkg. Fritos, crushed", "1 can Ranch-style beans", "1 bottle Catalina or California Dressing"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients except Fritos and lettuce.", "Chill. Add Fritos and lettuce just before serving."]

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. sour cream", "1 pkg. taco mix", "lettuce", "tomato", "cheese, shredded"]
instructions: ["Mix cream cheese, sour cream and taco mix together.", "Spread on plate or tray.", "Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes and shredded cheese.", "Use nacho or tortilla chips to dip."]

title: Molded Guacamole Ring
ingredients: ["2 envelopes unflavored gelatin", "1/2 c. cold water", "1 1/2 c. boiling water", "6 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice", "1 1/2 Tbsp. grated onion", "2 1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of Tabasco sauce", "3 c. mashed avocado (3 large)", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "seafood or chicken salad", "cherry tomatoes"]
instructions: ["Soften gelatin in cold water and dissolve in boiling water. Add lemon juice, onion and seasonings.", "While gelatin mixture is still liquid, stir in avocado.", "Fold in mayonnaise.", "Pour into 10-inch ring mold and chill until firm.", "Unmold and fill center with chilled seafood or chicken salad.", "Surround with cherry tomatoes.", "Serves 12.", "This may also be served on a tray surrounded with tortilla chips for an appetizer."]

title: Guacamole Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mashed avocado", "1/4 c. cottage cheese", "1/4 c. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. chopped green chilies", "2 Tbsp. chopped onions", "2 tsp. fresh lemon juice", "1/4 tsp. salt", "sliced zucchini, carrots and celery sticks"]
instructions: ["In blender combine avocado and remaining ingredients except sliced vegetables.", "Cover and process until smooth.", "Pour into bowl; cover and chill for 2 to 3 hours.", "Use vegetables as dippers."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["6 flour tortillas", "3 Tbsp. oil", "1 small onion, chopped", "4 oz. cream cheese", "10 oz. enchilada sauce", "2 c. Cheddar cheese", "4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts"]
instructions: ["Heat oil in skillet.", "Fry tortillas in hot oil 30 seconds per side.", "Set aside.", "Cook pieces chicken breasts in skillet.", "Add chopped onion.", "Cook until tender.", "Mix in cream cheese; cook until melted.", "Remove from heat.", "Fill each tortilla with equal portions of chicken mixture.", "Roll tortillas and place in ungreased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Cover with enchilada sauce and Cheddar cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until cheese is melted, approximately 20 minutes."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["4 chicken breasts", "12 flour tortillas", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies", "2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Rinse chicken; drain.", "Cook in water to cover in saucepan until tender; drain, bone and chop.", "Tear tortillas into pieces. Combine soups, onion and chilies in bowl; mix well.", "Layer tortillas, soup mixture, chicken and cheese alternately in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Yield:", "8 servings."]

title: Easy Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["2 c. cooked rice", "1 large can hot tamales", "1 can chili without beans"]
instructions: ["Layer.", "Grate cheese over top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until heated through.", "May be microwaved."]

title: Mexican Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ["5 or 6 chicken breasts (cooked and diced)", "1 lb. spaghetti (cooked and drained)", "1 lb. Velveeta Cheese", "1 can Cream of Mushroom Soup", "1 can Cream of Chicken Soup", "1 can Rotel Tomatoes"]
instructions: ["Cook together until melted: Velveeta, Soups, and Rotels. Next mix in the chicken and spaghetti, place in a baking dish in a 350\u00b0 oven until bubbly."]

title: Mexican Chicken
ingredients: ["2 fryers, cooked and cubed", "1 Tbsp. oleo", "2 cans cream of chicken soup", "1 can celery soup", "1 small can water chestnuts", "1 pkg. tortillas, cut in 1-inch pieces", "8 oz. Cheddar cheese, grated", "1 large onion", "1 small can black olives, chopped", "1 small jar chopped pimiento", "1 small can chopped green chilies"]

title: Carne Asada

title: Mackenzie'S Mexican Surprise
