instructions: ["Brown ground beef and onion.", "Drain.", "In a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish, pour Doritos first, then layer beef and onion and beans.", "Pour Ro-Tel over mixture.", "Top with cheese.", "Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 until cheese is melted, about 20 to 25 minutes."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 head lettuce, torn into bite size pieces", "1 (6 oz. or larger) pkg. corn chips, crumbled", "1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 c. green pepper", "1 1/2 c. chopped onion", "salt/pepper to taste", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 lb. Velveeta cheese", "1 small can Ro-Tel tomatoes", "2 medium tomatoes, chopped"]
instructions: ["Brown meat well in a large skillet. Drain. Add green pepper, onion, salt and pepper. Brown a few more minutes.", "Add tomatoes. Place in a large bowl in this order: lettuce, tomatoes, corn chips, hot meat mixture and hot cheese mixture."]

title: Taco Soup
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes with juice", "1 can (14 oz.) kidney beans with juice", "1 can (17 oz.) corn with juice", "1 can (8 oz.) tomato sauce", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "1 to 2 c. water", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 c. grated Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Brown beef in large heavy kettle; drain and add onions.", "Cook until onions are tender.", "Add remaining ingredients except cheese; simmer for 15 minutes.", "Ladle into bowls; top with the grated cheese. Yields 6 to 8 servings."]

title: Navajo Fry Bread(For Navajo Tacos)
ingredients: ["4 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. baking powder", "2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. melted butter", "2 c. milk"]
instructions: ["Mix ingredients and let set for 1 hour.", "Take small amount of dough and knead into a ball.", "Roll out on a floured surface.", "Fry in hot oil.", "Top with chili, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, etc. Use leftover bread for dessert.", "It's great with honey on top."]

title: Mexican Fahitas
ingredients: ["flank steak, cut into strips (6 oz. per person)", "2/3 c. oil", "1/3 c. vinegar", "3 to 4 green and red bell pepper strips", "2 slices large onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped peppers", "salt, pepper and garlic to taste", "flour tortilla", "chili con queso", "pico de gallo"]
instructions: ["Marinate steak in oil and vinegar overnight.", "Place a little oil in pan and saute over very high heat so meat sears.", "Add 2 tablespoons green peppers, salt, pepper and garlic.", "Cook until meat is done."]

title: Chicken Tamale Pie
ingredients: ["1 can cream of chicken", "1 can Ranch Style beans", "1 small can chopped green chilies", "1/4 tsp. chili powder", "1/2 c. Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. chopped green onions", "1 Jiffy muffin mix", "4 cooked chicken breasts"]
instructions: ["Mix soup, beans, chilies, chili powder, onions and chicken in a saucepan and heat.", "Mix muffin mix as directed.", "Add 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese.", "Pour into casserole dish and pull up onto sides. Pour heated mixture within 1/4 inch of edge.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Garnish with cheese, onions and cherry tomatoes."]

title: Jalapeno Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. sliced ripe olives", "2 Tbsp. cilantro", "2 Tbsp. sliced green onions", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "4 (10-inch) flour tortillas", "1/2 (7 oz.) jar sliced jalapeno peppers"]
instructions: ["Combine all filling ingredients in mixing bowl. Mix well. On each tortilla, spread about 1/2 cup mixture. Roll up tightly (jelly roll fashion). Wrap in Saran Wrap. Refrigerate at least 2 hours. Cut each tortilla into 12 slices. Makes 48."]

title: Mexican Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ["12 medium flour tortillas", "4 chicken breasts, cooked", "2 cans cream of chicken soup", "1 small can green chiles, diced, rinsed and drained", "1 pt. sour cream", "1 c. sharp cheese, grated", "1 c. Monterey Jack cheese, grated", "3 or 4 green onions, diced", "1 can black olives, sliced"]
instructions: ["Combine onions, green chiles, soup, sour cream, olives and 1/4 of each cheese. Set aside 1 1/2 cups of the combine mixture. Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan. Lay each tortilla flat and put in mixture.", "Roll up and put rolls in pan. Cover tortillas with the remaining mixture. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the tortillas. Refrigerate overnight.", "Bake in oven, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes. Enjoy."]

title: Quick Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. lean ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 pkg. Rice-A-Roni beef flavor", "1/2 c. salsa", "1 tsp. chili powder", "4 c. shredded lettuce", "1 medium tomato, chopped", "1/2 c. shredded cheese", "tortilla chips"]
instructions: ["In large skillet, brown ground beef and onion; drain.", "Remove from skillet; set aside.", "In same skillet, prepare Rice-A-Roni as package directs.", "Stir in meat mixture, salsa and chili powder; continue cooking over low heat 3 to 4 minutes or until heated through.", "Arrange lettuce on serving platter or bowl.", "Top with beef/rice mixture, tomato and cheese.", "Garnish or serve with tortilla chips."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef, browned and drained", "1 lb. can kidney beans, drained", "1 large onion, chopped", "3 to 4 chopped tomatoes", "1 large head lettuce, shredded", "8 oz. grated Cheddar cheese", "1 small bag crushed Tortilla chips", "1 (8 oz.) bottle Russian dressing"]
instructions: ["Mix first 3 ingredients and refrigerate.", "Then mix next 3 ingredients.", "Toss these two parts together; at the last minute add chips and Russian dressing."]

title: Fresh Salsa
ingredients: ["4 medium tomatoes, diced", "1 medium onion, diced", "1 jalapeno or serrano pepper (raw), diced", "1 c. cilantro, diced", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients in a bowl and add salt and pepper to desired taste. If you desire a hot taste leave all seeds in peppers. If you desire a milder taste, cut peppers in half and take out all seeds."]

title: New Mexico Salsa
ingredients: ["2 (4 oz.) cans chopped green chilies", "3 to 4 stalks celery, diced", "2 bunches green onions, diced", "1 can black olives, chopped", "2 (29 oz.) cans cooking tomatoes, chopped", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/4 c. cider vinegar (more for mild, less for hot)", "1 to 2 jalapenos, chopped (optional)"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Refrigerate overnight to blend flavors."]

title: Taco Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "2 to 4 Tbsp. chili powder", "2 c. tortilla chips", "1/2 c. green onions, chopped", "1 c. grated Cheddar", "1 (15 oz.) can chili beans", "2 Tbsp. taco sauce", "1 Tbsp. garlic salt", "1 c. sour cream", "1 tomato, chopped"]
instructions: ["Cook ground beef in 10-inch skillet until brown.", "Drain.", "Stir in beans, tomato sauce, taco sauce, chili powder and garlic salt. Heat to boiling.", "Coarsely break chips and place in ungreased 2-quart casserole dish.", "Top with beef mixture, spread sour cream. Sprinkle onions, tomatoes and cheese.", "Cook, uncovered, in 350\u00b0 oven until hot and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes.", "Arrange additional tortilla chips around edge of casserole.", "Serve with shredded lettuce, chili peppers and taco sauce.", "Yields 6 servings."]

title: Tortilla Appetizer Wedges
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 (4.25 oz.) can ChiChi's diced green chilies", "1/2 c. sliced green onions", "1 Tbsp. minced red and green jalapeno peppers", "salt and pepper", "10 (6 to 8-inch) flour tortillas", "salsa or picante sauce or salsa verde"]
instructions: ["In medium bowl, combine cream cheese and sour cream; mix well. Stir in chilies, onions and jalapenos.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Spread tortilla with about 1/4 cup cream cheese mixture; top with another tortilla.", "Continue spreading and stacking tortillas until stack is 4 tortillas high.", "Top with another tortilla that has not been spread with cream cheese mixture. Make another stack with remaining 5 tortillas.", "Wrap tortilla stacks in plastic wrap.", "Refrigerate at least 1 hour.", "Cut each stack into 18 wedges.", "Arrange pinwheel fashion around cup of salsa, picante sauce or salsa verde.", "Makes 36 appetizer servings."]

title: Italian Avocado Dip
ingredients: ["1 pint light sour cream", "1 pkg. dry Italian dressing mix", "1/4 c. light mayo", "Juice of 1 lemon", "1 finely chopped avocado", "1 can drained rotel"]
instructions: ["Mix ingredients well and serve with veggies!"]

title: Mexican Corn Pudding
ingredients: ["1 c. yellow cornmeal", "1 c. grated cheese", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 can cream-style corn", "2 eggs, beaten", "2 c. milk", "1 can diced chilies", "5 Tbsp. melted butter", "garlic to taste"]
instructions: ["Just mix and bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0."]

title: Mexican Chocolate
ingredients: ["1/2 c. chocolate chips", "1 Tbsp. instant coffee", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "2 c. hot milk"]
instructions: ["Put all ingredients into blender and puree.", "May substitute mint chocolate chips for plain chocolate chips."]

title: Tortilla Soup
ingredients: ["4 (14 oz.) cans Del Monte Mexican-style stewed tomatoes", "2 (12 oz.) cans Niblets Mexicorn", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 c. water", "shredded Monterey Jack cheese", "tortilla chips"]
instructions: ["In large pot, combine all, except cheese and chips.", "Bring to a boil using medium heat.", "(Can mash tomatoes, if desired.)"]

title: Wallace'S Tortilla Dogs
ingredients: ["1 oz. Velveeta pasteurized process cheese spread, cut into 1/4-inch strips", "1 flour tortilla (6-inch)", "1 Oscar Mayer wiener"]
instructions: ["Place Velveeta cheese spread and wiener on flour tortilla; roll up.", "Microwave on paper towel on High for 45 seconds, or until cheese is melted and wiener is hot.", "Serve with salsa. Makes 1 serving."]

title: Mexican Jalapeno Cornbread
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef, browned and drained", "1 c. yellow cornmeal", "1/2 c. cooking oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 can cream-style corn (No. 2 large)", "3 jalapeno peppers, chopped", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. milk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 onion, chopped fine", "1/2 lb. grated cheese"]
instructions: ["Mix eggs, cornmeal, milk, oil, soda, salt and corn.", "Place half of mixture in skillet or pan that has been sprayed with Pam. Top with ground beef, onions, grated cheese and jalapeno peppers. Put remaining cornbread mixture on top.", "Bake 50 to 60 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Tamale Dip
ingredients: ["1 block of 16 oz. Velveeta Cheese", "2 cans Chili Con Carne, with or without beans", "1 cup salsa", "1 can (large) green diced chilies", "1 large can Tamales"]
instructions: ["Cut up Velveeta cheese in small pieces,", "Add Chili Con Carne, salsa and canned chilies.", "Unwrap and cut up the tamales in bite size.", "Mix all ingredients well and place in a deep dish and bake for 30 -35 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven.", "Serve with chips or crackers."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 doz. corn tortillas", "2 c. Jack cheese", "3/4 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. flour", "2 c. chicken broth", "1 c. sour cream", "1/2 can jalapenos", "2 cans chicken"]
instructions: ["Cook tortillas in oil.", "Fill with chicken, onions and cheese."]

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["3 medium ripe avocados", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "tortilla chips", "1 (16 oz.) can spicy refried beans", "1 bunch green onions, chopped finely (about 1 c. total)", "1 c. low-fat sour cream", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 pkg. taco mix (seasoning)", "3 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (about 2 c.)", "2 cans chopped or sliced black olives", "8 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded"]
instructions: ["Mash avocados.", "Add lemon juice, salt and pepper.", "In separate bowl, mix sour cream, mayonnaise and taco seasoning.", "Refrigerate both mixtures."]

title: Mexican Lasagna
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "6 to 8 halved taco shells", "1 c. sour cream", "1 (12 oz.) jar salsa", "1 can refried beans", "4 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese", "shredded lettuce"]
instructions: ["In a skillet, brown the ground beef and drain.", "Stir in 1/2 cup salsa.", "Spread 1/4 cup salsa in a glass baking dish.", "Top with 3 or 4 taco shells.", "Top with half of each:", "beans, meat mixture, sour cream and cheese.", "Repeat layers; cover with foil.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Top with lettuce and remaining salsa.", "This dish will serve 6 to 8 people."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 chicken", "1 large onion", "2 small cans chopped green chilies", "2 cans cream of chicken soup", "1 can of water", "1 pkg. Tostitos or Doritos chips", "Longhorn or Cheddar cheese, shredded"]
instructions: ["Boil chicken and cut in bite size pieces. Chop onion and saute in butter in large skillet. Add green chilies, soup and water. Mix and simmer 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 medium onion, chopped", "3 tomatoes, chopped", "Doritos, chopped", "1/2 c. Wish-Bone", "1 can red kidney beans, drained", "1 head lettuce, chopped", "8 to 12 oz. shredded Cheddar (1 bag cheese)", "1 pkg. Hidden Valley dressing or 1 c. bottled Hidden Valley dressing"]
instructions: ["Brown meat; add salt, pepper to taste and kidney beans. Simmer 15 minutes.", "Cool.", "Add rest of ingredients.", "Doritos and lettuce when serving."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["8 oz. cooked chicken, chopped", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 can green enchilada sauce", "1 can green chiles", "1/2 can chicken broth", "9 corn tortillas", "3/4 c. finely chopped onion", "8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Mix chicken, sour cream, enchilada sauce, green chiles and chicken broth in pan and heat.", "Fry tortillas until softened. Layer in shallow pan the sauce, tortillas and onion and top with cheese.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. Velveeta", "1 can chicken soup", "1 can Ro-Tel", "1 1/2 lb. ground beef, browned and drained", "1 pkg. corn tortillas", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 can chili beans", "1 small bag Fritos"]
instructions: ["Melt cheese, soup and tomatoes (Ro-Tel).", "In oblong pan, layer tortillas, beef, onion and beans.", "Pour melted cheese mixture over entire casserole.", "Crumble Fritos on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until bubbly and brown on top, 1/2 hour to 45 minutes."]

title: Chicken Tacos(Low-Fat)
ingredients: ["8 chicken breast halves, cooked and torn up", "1/2 to 3/4 c. mild picante sauce", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. cumin", "lettuce, torn up", "tomatoes, chopped", "onions, diced", "taco shells in box"]
instructions: ["Add sugar, picante sauce and cumin to chicken breast pieces. Cook on low temperature for 3 minutes, stirring.", "Toast taco shells in oven until lightly browned.", "Fill shells with meat. Garnish each taco with lettuce, tomatoes and onions."]

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["2 (10 oz.) jalapeno bean dip", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. Tabasco", "2 avocados, mashed or 2 cans avocado dip", "1 (16 oz.) sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "green onions", "tomatoes", "cheese, shredded", "black olives"]
instructions: ["Layer in 9 x", "13-inch pan bean dip, avocados mixed with garlic and Tabasco, sour cream, mayonnaise and taco seasoning (mixed), then", "top", "with", "remaining", "ingredients.", "Serve with chips."]

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger", "1 lb. sausage", "1 (16 oz.) salsa sauce", "1 lb. Velveeta cheese", "1 can mushroom soup"]
instructions: ["Brown lean hamburger and sausage in large skillet.", "Drain off fat.", "Add Velveeta cheese, cut in cubes.", "Stir until cheese melts. Add soup and salsa sauce.", "Serve warm with your choice of corn chips."]

title: Mexican Fruitcake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. soda", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple with juice", "2 beaten eggs", "1 c. pecans"]
instructions: ["Combine dry ingredients.", "Add pineapple and eggs.", "Mix with mixer about 2 minutes.", "Add pecans.", "Bake in 9 x 13-inch loaf pan greased and floured.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: American Pierogi Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. large noodles, cooked", "1 large onion, sliced", "6 potatoes, peeled and cooked", "2 Tbsp. butter", "American cheese slices"]
instructions: ["Saute onion in butter and", "add", "to", "potatoes which have been boiled and drained.", "Mash", "together.", "Butter large casserole dish and add 1/2 of", "the", "noodles.", "Spread", "mashed potato mixture over noodles and top with", "slices of cheese.", "Add rest of noodles and again top with cheese slices.", "Dot with butter; cover.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven until cheese melts."]

title: Jalapeno Corn Bread
ingredients: ["3 c. corn bread mix", "2 1/2 c. sweet milk", "1 small can creamed corn", "1 1/2 c. cheese, grated", "1 large chopped or grated onion", "2 eggs", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. Mazola oil", "1 (16 oz.) jar jalapeno peppers or 2 1/2 peppers (if desired not so hot)"]
instructions: ["Mix ingredients.", "Grease pan and bake at 450\u00b0 until done."]

title: Mexican Casserole
ingredients: ["1 can refried beans", "1 (4 oz.) can green chilies, chopped", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 pkg. taco mix", "3/4 c. tomatoes", "3/4 c. sliced black olives", "3/4 c. green onions", "3/4 c. grated cheese"]
instructions: ["Mix beans and chopped chilies.", "Layer in small (4 x 8-inch) dish.", "Mix together and layer on top of beans sour cream, mayonnaise and taco mix.", "Mix together and add next layer of tomatoes, black olives and green onions.", "Top with grated cheese. Serve cold or heated."]

title: Salsa
ingredients: ["3 c. tomatoes, diced", "1/2 c. onion, finely chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "2 to 3 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 tsp. oregano", "jalapeno pepper to taste (optional)", "cilantro (optional)"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients in medium bowl."]

title: Fruit Flour Tortillas

instructions: ["Place filling in tortillas.", "Roll up and place in baking dish, seam side down.", "Bring to boil the sugar, butter, water and flavoring.", "Pour boiling mixture over tortillas and soak for 40 minutes.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes."]

title: Rice With Beans And Cheese
ingredients: ["2 c. brown rice, cooked", "2 c. cooked black beans", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "1 large onion, chopped", "1/2 c. canned chilies, chopped", "1/2 lb. Jack cheese, shredded", "1/2 lb. Ricotta cheese, thinned slightly with milk", "1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Mix rice, beans, garlic, onion and chilies.", "Layer this mixture alternately in a greased casserole with Jack and Ricotta cheese, ending with rice mixture.", "Bake for 30 minutes.", "During last few minutes of baking, sprinkle grated Cheddar cheese over top.", "Serves 6 to 8."]

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ["1 can Frito-Lay bean dip or can of refried beans", "8 oz. sour cream", "8 oz. taco sauce", "1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 tomato, chopped", "1 onion, chopped"]
instructions: ["Layer bean dip in bottom of a pie plate.", "Spread sour cream on top.", "Spread taco sauce on top.", "Sprinkle with cheese, tomato and onion.", "Serve with taco chips."]

title: Mexican Meat Loaf
ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburg", "1 c. bread crumbs", "1/2 c. milk", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/4 c. grated cheese", "1 green pepper, minced", "1 onion, if desired", "6 stuffed olives, chopped", "2 tsp. melted butter"]
instructions: ["Mix ingredients together.", "Bake in greased loaf pan at 375\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Kristy'S Mexican Casserole

instructions: ["Brown meat and onion until done.", "Line pan with chips (15 x 11-inch pan).", "Add layer of meat mixture, cover with tomatoes and top with cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until cheese melts."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 whole chicken", "2 cans cream of chicken soup", "2 cans green chilies, chopped", "1 pt. sour cream", "1 pkg. flour tortillas", "cheddar cheese, grated"]
instructions: ["Boil chicken", "until tender; debone and cut into pieces.", "Mix chicken,", "soup, green chilies, and sour cream together."]

title: Jalapeno Fudge
ingredients: ["1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies, drained", "3 large eggs", "3 c. Monterey Jack cheese, grated"]

Delicious served on crackers."]

title: Mexican Cornbread
ingredients: ["1 c. yellow self-rising meal", "1 can cream-style corn", "1/2 c. oil", "1 c. milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 lb. hamburger, browned", "4 bell peppers, chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "1/2 lb. grated cheese"]
instructions: ["Cook hamburger, bell peppers and onion.", "Add cheese.", "Add to meal, corn, oil, milk and salt.", "Mix all together and bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes or until brown."]

title: Taco Bake
ingredients: ["2 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onions", "1 pkg. taco seasoning mix", "1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 (15 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained", "1 c. shredded cheese", "2 c. Bisquick mix", "1 c. milk", "2 eggs", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 jar salsa", "shredded lettuce", "chopped tomatoes"]
instructions: ["Cook ground beef with onions until browned and drain well. Spoon into a 13 x 9-inch ungreased baking dish.", "Into this stir taco seasoning, drained corn and tomato sauce.", "Spread evenly in dish.", "Sprinkle 1 cup shredded cheese on top.", "Mix Bisquick, milk and eggs until well blended.", "Pour over beef mixture.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 35 minutes.", "Serve with lettuce, tomato, salsa and sour cream."]

title: Impossible Tamale Pie
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 envelope taco seasoning mix", "1 (8 oz.) can stewed tomatoes, drained and chopped", "1 c. frozen corn, thawed and drained", "3 eggs", "1 1/2 c. milk", "2/3 c. buttermilk baking mix", "1/3 c. yellow cornmeal"]
instructions: ["Grease 10 x 1 1/2-inch pie plate.", "Cook and stir ground beef in skillet until brown; drain.", "Stir in onion and seasoning mix. Spread in plate.", "Sprinkle with tomatoes and corn.", "Beat eggs, milk, baking mix and cornmeal until smooth.", "Pour into pie plate. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.", "Cool 5 minutes.", "Yields 6 to 8 servings."]

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ["1 boiled chicken", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1/2 c. chicken broth", "cheese", "2 cans cream of mushroom soup", "1 can chopped green chilies", "tortillas", "onion"]
instructions: ["Mix soups, onions and green chilies with a dash of salt. Layer the pan with tortillas dipped in oil.", "Layer that with chicken.", "Pour 1/2 soup mixture, then top with cheese.", "Repeat. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted."]

title: Mexican Chip Dip
ingredients: ["1 lb. Velveeta cheese, melted", "1 can diced tomatoes", "green chiles", "1 lb. sausage", "1 lb. ground beef", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt"]
instructions: ["Brown sausage and ground beef; drain.", "Combine all ingredients and put in crock-pot to keep warm.", "Use as a hearty appetizer or party snack with corn chips or tortilla chips."]

title: Salsa Verde
ingredients: ["10 lb. tomatoes", "3 diced yellow onions", "20 cayenne peppers", "5 lb. green tomatoes", "4 minced garlic cloves"]
instructions: ["Peel, core and chop tomatoes. Chop peppers.", "Mix all together. Add salt and black pepper to taste.", "Bring just to a boil.", "Ladle into hot pint jars. Add 1 teaspoon lemon juice and/or vinegar to each jar.", "Adjust lids."]

title: Chicken Enchilada
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped onion", "1 clove garlic, minced (optional)", "1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes", "2 1/2 or 3 c. cooked, shredded chicken (3 or 4 pieces, breast)", "10 to 12 tortillas (flour)", "1/2 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese", "3 chicken bouillon cubes", "Swiss cheese"]
instructions: ["Saute onion and garlic.", "Add tomatoes, chicken and bouillon, simmer 15 minutes.", "Add Cheddar cheese.", "Spoon into tortillas, roll up and place in 9 x 13-inch baking dish.", "Sprinkle with Swiss cheese and bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Mexican Wedding Cookies
ingredients: ["5 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 egg", "2 c. Wesson oil"]
instructions: ["Mix together, press and roll into small balls.", "Then flatten. Bake at 350\u00b0 until lightly brown.", "Let cool slightly.", "Cover in sugar and cinnamon."]
